the execution properties of O camel code

all us Equity exchanges a peak of 5

requires real careful understanding of

compiler can generate surprisingly

there's not a big miracle that happens

when incredibly high performance is not

about another a simple example is

expressed effort into and just the

you realize oh that really is a fallacy
